targets.query: SELECT last("response_message_fan_1_fanSpeed") FROM /^$deviceId$/ WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT last("response_message_heaterState") FROM /^$deviceId$/ WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT last("response_message_fan_1_fanState") FROM /^$deviceId$/ WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT last("response_message_runTime") FROM /^$deviceId$/ WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT "response_1_rxByte","response_1_txByte","response_1_rxPacket","response_1_txPacket","response_1_rxError","response_1_txError" 
FROM /^$deviceId$/ 
WHERE $timeFilter 
ORDER BY time DESC 
LIMIT 1
